description.Power Outlets: Most tables have an outlet or a power strip nearby
description.Seating: Fair amount of tables, some for large group seating and some individuals. A few couches too!
description.Provision: Pretentious, yet delicious coffee. Have great pastries as well.

description.Seating: Great student-like tables for 1 or 2 people. Easy to spend hours here with that kind of private space.
description.Service: They are nice and value their customers
description.Provision: Coffee is just alright. Food is pretty alright. Seating and outlets is where it's at
